channel.title: Help with my compiler
channel.description:
in the allstarscape v2 compiler, i have everything done correctly to set up the server. Classpath/path variables set to 6.1.0_20 because i have JDK 6 update 20 and i have the portforwarding done correctly, but when i try to compile it shows an error saying
"you do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. Go to Mod Tahorak's tutorial on the moparscape tutorials section for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK updates." Press any key to continue...
I'm able to run the server though, but no one can join, i need help with that problem as well please, I have teamviewer.

item.title: Help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @vanmaster5 vanmaster5
item.description:
@vanmaster5 wrote:

ty so much, i can compile now but no one can join my server, does anyone no the problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Left click on your complier , then go edit,
Delete all and add this:

@echo off color 0a title Perfect Complier if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished ! pause exit
This happened to me too, and i had JDK & JRE 6 Update 20. But with this complier it never happens, HOpe it Helped u =)

Read full topic

item.description:
@brian9612 wrote:

try to download JDK 5.0 or 6.0 maybe that will help
